701051.desc: Boosts all parameters (50%) & boosts Spark damage (100%) & boosts BB ATK (150%) & adds probability of resistance against 1 KO attack (70%) & negates elemental damage
701051.name: Armor of Superiority

701053.desc: Boosts ATK and REC (40%) & boosts elemental damage (50%) & boosts Spark damage (100%) & chance to add Spark vulnerability (25% chance) for 1 turn
701053.name: Old Crown Fragment

800011.desc: A pouch filled with cooking necessities

dictionary.lore: Spice pouches are usually prepared by travelling merchants and peddlers, filled with various cooking ingredients and seasoning. They are often traded to adventurers as a travelling necessity for spicing up their meals while traversing for days outfield before reaching their destination. Having a good meal is great for the mind and soul!

800011.name: Spice Pouch

800014.desc: Drop formed from the dew around the area where the Vortex emerges

dictionary.lore: As the Vortex emerges through summonings and the crossing of planes by Summoners, its elemental aura energizes the droplets around it, causing their purity to shimmer. They are hard to come by, but are said to have revitalizing powers.

800014.name: Miracle Drop

800104.desc: A strange piece of glowing crystal that holds a rare power.

dictionary.lore: A strange piece of glowing crystal that holds a rare power. It was created from the memories of a Knight of Grandshelt who is eager to defend her friends, no matter where their travels may take them.

800104.name: (Charlotte's) Memory Fragment

dictionary.lore: A scroll containing forbidden magic.

800400.desc: A pure white flower. Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: A beautiful flower that is commonly used as decoration during celebrations.

800400.name: Lilium

800401.desc: A deacon's bell. Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: A bell that, when rang, is said to raise the spirits of all who hear it.

800401.name: Ascension Bell

800402.desc: Believed to bring the bearer good luck! Unique event crafting material.

dictionary.lore: Folklore says if you collect enough of it; something good will happen, just remember it didn't work for the rabbit.

800402.name: Rabbit's Foot

800501.desc: A hardy stone that protects its bearer.

dictionary.lore: A hardy stone that protects its bearer. It draws strength on its owner's desire to protect others, and thus cracks easily when they are found lacking.

800501.name: Litrock

800502.desc: The ashes of burnt spiritwood trees.

dictionary.lore: The ashes of burnt spiritwood trees said to be imbued with a holy power, and to protect those who pray for their hopes and dreams.

800502.name: Heaven's Ash

800503.desc: A large crystal fueled by esper energy.

dictionary.lore: A large crystal fueled by esper energy. They are quite rare and only activate when heroes are nearby.

800503.name: Sacred Crystal

800504.desc: A mysterious powder left by spirits in their wake.

dictionary.lore: A mysterious powder left by spirits in their wake. It is said to reveal both one's future and fears when it is burnt.

800504.name: Spiritsand

800505.desc: A heavy crystal fueled by esper energy.

dictionary.lore: A heavy crystal fueled by esper energy. They are extremely rare and said to only call out to those deemed worthy.

800505.name: Holy Crystal

800506.desc: A strangely glowing crystal that holds a memory of courage.

dictionary.lore: A strangely glowing crystal that holds a memory of courage belonging to a Knight of Grandshelt. It evokes memories of friendship, laughter, and home.

800506.name: (Charlotte's) Courage Fragment

800507.desc: Boosts drop rate of materials for 3 turns.

dictionary.lore: A potion that brings luck to those who consume it.

800507.name: Lucky Potion

dictionary.lore: A sinister-looking mixture that offers protection against Dark energy.

800509.desc: Activates Dark Barrier for all allies.

dictionary.lore: An ominous concoction that protects Summoners and common people alike from Dark forces.

800509.name: Dark Vial

800606.desc: A pair of matching heart pendants that fit perfectly together.

dictionary.lore: A pair of matching heart pendants.Together they fit perfectly and complement each other. Often given as a symbol of love between partners.

800606.name: Love Pendant

800701.desc: An orb filled with the essence of Fire.

dictionary.lore: An orb filled with the essence of Fire. This potent power enhances one's affinity and control of the element.

800701.name: Fire Essence

800702.desc: An orb filled with the essence of Water.

dictionary.lore: An orb filled with the essence of Water. This potent power enhances one's affinity and control of the element.

800702.name: Water Essence

800703.desc: An orb filled with the essence of Earth.

dictionary.lore: An orb filled with the essence of Earth. This potent power enhances one's affinity and control of the element.

800703.name: Earth Essence

800704.desc: An orb filled with the essence of Thunder.

dictionary.lore: An orb filled with the essence of Thunder. This potent power enhances one's affinity and control of the element.

800704.name: Thunder Essence

800705.desc: An orb filled with the essence of Light.

dictionary.lore: An orb filled with the essence of Light. This potent power enhances one's affinity and control of the element.

800705.name: Light Essence

800706.desc: An orb filled with the essence of Darkness.

dictionary.lore: An orb filled with the essence of Darkness. This potent power enhances one's affinity and control of the element.

800706.name: Dark Essence

800707.desc: A talismanic treasure that is imbued with the power of Orochi.

dictionary.lore: A talismanic treasure that is imbued with the power of Orochi. Once used, the dark power within will tempt you to seek out more.

800707.name: Orochi's Seal

800801.desc: A unique pin used to stylishly bind several materials together.

dictionary.lore: A unique pin used to stylishly bind several materials together. It is said that only a few crafters know how to make that special flowery flourish.

800801.name: Rose Bolt

800802.desc: A bullet with an inscription of a heart, it is said to symbolize a gunpowder romance.

dictionary.lore: A bullet with an inscription of a heart, it is said to symbolize a gunpowder romance. Some, of course, have said that it is an omen of a fiery shotgun wedding.

800802.name: Love Bullet

800803.desc: A brilliantly colored crystal that glows with power.

dictionary.lore: A brilliantly colored crystal that glows with power. Strangely enough, it is said to smell like roses when sniffed--a hazardous choice, considering that it is known to be abrasive to one's lungs.

800803.name: Pink Crystore

800804.desc: A special set of documents detailing how to build a unique set of weapons.

dictionary.lore: A special set of documents detailing how to build a unique set of weapons. Some of these plans require materials that are literally out of this world.

800804.name: VALIS Schematics

800805.desc: A special document detailing one's marriage to a very enthusiastic candidate.

dictionary.lore: A special document detailing one's marriage to a very enthusiastic candidate. A careful reading of the terms reveals several strange requirements, such as "must be able to outrun bullets, shockwaves, and explosions."

800805.name: Marriage Certificate

800901.desc: A crystallized shard of power crafted from pure fire.
800901.name: Ignis Shard

800902.desc: A crystallized shard of power crafted from pure ice.
800902.name: Algor Shard

800903.desc: A crystallized shard of power crafted from pure earth.
800903.name: Terra Shard

800904.desc: A crystallized shard of power crafted from pure lightning.
800904.name: Fulgur Shard

800905.desc: A crystallized shard of power crafted from pure light.
800905.name: Lux Shard

800906.desc: A crystallized shard of power crafted from pure shadow.
800906.name: Umbra Shard

800907.desc: This tome of elemental power unlocks a hero's potential within.
800907.name: Elementum Tome

800908.desc: This tome of greater elemental power unlocks a hero's potential within.
800908.name: Geminus Tome

801006.desc: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Fire, it feels warm to the touch.

dictionary.lore: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Fire, it feels warm to the touch.

801006.name: Fire Lacrima

801007.desc: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Water, it feels cool to the touch.

dictionary.lore: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Water, it feels cool to the touch.

801007.name: Water Lacrima

801008.desc: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Earth, it feels soft to the touch.

dictionary.lore: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Earth, it feels soft to the touch.

801008.name: Earth Lacrima

801009.desc: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Thunder, it feels electrifying to the touch.

dictionary.lore: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Thunder, it feels electrifying to the touch.

801009.name: Thunder Lacrima

801010.desc: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Light, it feels warm to the touch.

dictionary.lore: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Light, it feels warm to the touch.

801010.name: Light Lacrima

801011.desc: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Darkness, it feels cold to the touch.

dictionary.lore: A form of Lacrima infused with the power of Darkness, it feels cold to the touch.

801011.name: Dark Lacrima

801900.desc: A small artificial goddess from another world. This being was created accidentally through an unknown process of Alchemy, and it constantly emits a small amount of Light energy.
801900.name: Light Goddess Jar

818897.desc: 20% boost to Def, max HP, 5% damage reduction & negates status ailments.

dictionary.lore: A weapon forged from memories and relics from a faraway home, this item glows with the light of the otherworldly might found within. A soft hum can be heard whenever it is held by heroes with good hearts, bound by courage and friendship to defend the world against evil.

818897.name: Patriot

818904.desc: 20% boost to all parameters, damage taken may restore HP & reduces BB gauge required for BB

dictionary.lore: A small, almost unremarkable chunk of gold shaped vaguely like a heart, it contains many warm memories and happy thoughts tempered by a cruel world. The light shining brightly deep within can make even the saddest hearts happy once again. When placed in a toy soldier's chest, it can make him a real boy--almost.

818904.name: Golden Heart

818912.desc: BB gauge refills slightly faster, slightly reduces the consumption of BB gauge & chance of inflicting Poison, Weakness, Injury, Paralysis

dictionary.lore: After upgrading her cannon, Bonnie left behind a strange mechanical contraption before bouncing off into the woods. Engineers from Randall began studying the gadget, hoping to create an alloy of unprecedented strength. Their experiments were fraught with many perils. While they failed to achieve their goal, they did manage to replicate and apply some mysterious properties to an extent. The results were the weapon enhancers that could manipulate weight and strike any target with a mild, weakening electrical charge.

818912.name: Paskuan Enhancer

818931.desc: 30% boost to Atk, max HP, boosts critical hit rate & boosts Atk when BB gauge is full

dictionary.lore: Korzan's treasured Vulcan Axe is a weapon like no other. Forged from orihalcum, the bone and crystallized heart of an Elder Magma Salamander, the Vulcan Axe was commissioned by Overlord Azurai to celebrate the birth of his son. The soul of the beast lived on within the weapon, but only a warrior worthy of its fiery might could call forth its true power. Although known for their extraordinary strength, the only known Morokai to have ever wielded the Vulcan Axe effectively were Overlord Azurai, and Korzan himself. In battle, the flames of the Salamander would engulf the weapon, making it capable of melting both metal and rock in a matter of seconds.

818931.name: Vulcan Axe

818932.desc: 20% boost to all parameters, reduces gauge cost required for BB & boosts BB Atk

dictionary.lore: The Glacies Staff used by Haile has been heavily modified to suit her aggressive style of combat. The staff is forged entirely from mithril, an extremely durable but lightweight material found only within the mountain mines of Myrranthia. The crystal lacrima embedded into the staff is said to be the frozen tear of a legendary Ice Serpent, an incredibly rare resource that provides un-paralleled efficacy when channeling magic. In the hands of a novice the staff would rapidly deplete its bearer's mana, possibly killing them in the process. However, in the right hands it is capable of greatly reducing the casting time of spells while simultaneously magnifying its owner's powers.

818932.name: Glacies Staff

818933.desc: 50% boost to Atk, 50% boost to Spark damage & probable infliction of random status ailment

dictionary.lore: At a glance, Avani's chainblades seems like a bad joke designed to shred its wielder before he or she can use them. In truth, the blades were designed by Avani herself to subdue the beasts that roam the Baldemar badlands. Forged from orihalcum and treated with a venom concoction extracted from the most venomous beasts of Baldemar, a single wound from the blade or barb from the chains could quickly cripple even the most ferocious of beasts. As if the venom wasn't enough, the oddly serrated edges of the blade could inflict wounds so terrible they never heal.

818933.name: Vorpal Chainblades

818934.desc: 30% boost to Def, max HP, boosts BB gauge each turn, negates critical & element based damage

dictionary.lore: An enchanted shield that belonged to the first Deva Champion who dealt a crushing defeat to the first invading Morokai horde.  This legendary artifact has since been passed down from one Champion to another. Even after five hundred years of war, the shield still retains its luster and bears not a single scratch nor dent on it. The technique used to forge the shield was lost to the flames of war when one of their grand forges was razed to the ground. After being named Champion by the Emperor himself, Mikael became the shield's next bearer. Ironically, it had previously been wielded by his beloved brother, a disgraced Champion and branded traitor suspected of fleeing the battlefield.

818934.name: Eremorn's Aegis

818935.desc: 30% boost to Rec, max HP, boosts OD gauge fill rate & restores HP each turn

dictionary.lore: Every Deva Librarian is required to pass the exams for basic Arcane understanding and manipulation. To assist them in maintain their libraries, they utilize magical staffs as instruments to move massive shelves from one place to another, or sieve through mountains of scrolls that need sorting. Due to the predicament Allanon brought upon himself, his trusty staff has been customized to be more suited for combat. However, since it uses a mishmash of untested crystals from Myrranthia and Baldemar, Allanon's staff is capable of delivering some rather...unpredictable results. Please use with caution.

818935.name: Ritus Staff

818936.desc: 20% boost to all parameters, boosts critical hit rate, probable 20% reduction of damage taken & boosts critical hit damage

dictionary.lore: A pair of old bronze bells Nyami cherishes more than any treasure in the world. These are the only memento she has left of her sister; a gift for her 3rd birthday. On the day her sister was taken away by the slavers, the bells stopped ringing although they weren't damaged. Not even a rattle could be heard. It was as if the bells took a vow of silence, so they would not attract any unwanted attention. Allanon believes that Nyami's bells were imbued with an ancient power borne from her sister's powerful desire to protect her. The bells are not broken and still "ring" to this day, toying with the minds of those who harbor any ill intent towards its master.

818936.name: Nyami's Bells

818937.desc: Greatly boosts BB Atk & boosts elemental damage

dictionary.lore: Using the essence extracted from Chromatic Blossoms with a strange mechanical contraption Bonnie left behind, the top engineers of Randall crafted an exquisite enhancement charm. It unleashes energy in such great magnitudes that its wearer is said to become able to penetrate any foe's armor.

818937.name: Lop Blessing

818938.desc: 20% boost to all parameters, 5% damage reduction, boosts BB Atk & largely boosts Atk and Def when BB gauge is full

dictionary.lore: A beautiful orange gemstone coveted by the Morokai as a good luck charm, cherished by the renegade Deva Librarian Allanon. The stone only forms deep within the belly of an aged Giant Rock Turtle. It took the combined effort of the members of Rih'alnase to crack open the belly of one such turtle, which mistook the curious Librarian for it's dinner. Having earned the respect and trust of Rih'alnase, the gemstone has been bestowed upon a summoner who has earned the respect and trust of the wondering band of misfits.

818938.name: Bond of Rih'alnase

818988.desc: 15% boost to Def, Rec, boosts damage reduction (10%) when guarding & restores HP (1000-1500 HP) each turn

dictionary.lore: A light and simple shield wielded by an order of courageous knights.

818988.name: Courage Buckler

818989.desc: 20% boost to Def, Rec, max HP, probable (20%) 20% damage reduction, boosts damage reduction (15%) when guarding & restores HP (1500-2000 HP) each turn.

dictionary.lore: A sacred shield said to be imbued with the power of light. It protects its bearer against dark forces.

818989.name: Courage Shield

818990.desc: 25% boost to Atk, Def, Rec, max HP, probable (40%) 30% damage reduction, boosts damage reduction (20%) when guarding, restores HP (2000-2500 HP) each turn & damage taken slightly boosts BB gauge (1-2 BC)

dictionary.lore: Only those with enough courage to protect and defend their allies are able to wield this wondrous shield. Legend has it that the protection it offers is a reflection of the bravery residing within the bearer's heart.

818990.name: Courage Aegis

819005.desc: Boosts critical hit rate (20%) and damage (50%) & critical damage adds Fire, Water, Earth, Thunder elements to attack for 3 turns

dictionary.lore: An ancient pendant that seduces its wielder with the promise of power beyond their imagination. It can be found almost anywhere nowadays.

819005.name: Orochi's Mark

819006.desc: Boosts critical hit rate (25%) and damage (65%) & critical hits adds Fire, Water, Earth, Thunder, Dark elements to atk for 3 turns

dictionary.lore: An ancient artifact that has Orochi's Mark on it. Some say that this is used to obtain its dark power. One is warned never to gaze upon it for long.

819006.name: Orochi's Symbol

819007.desc: Boosts crit hit rate (30%) and damage (100%), crit hits adds all elements to atk for 3 turns & Boosts Atk (200%) for first 2 turns

dictionary.lore: An orb that pulsates with Orochi's power. It tempts weak-willed seekers of power with promises of victory for a dark price.

819007.name: Orochi's Crest

819094.desc: 20% boost to Atk, max HP & normal attack boosts BB gauge

dictionary.lore: Elphelt's signature rifle packs a lethal punch with every shot. It's certainly a lovely way to punctuate a heartfelt expression of love, such as "Boom, HEARTSHOT!"

819094.name: Miss Confire

819095.desc: 20% boost to Atk, max HP, probability of raising normal hit amount & normal attack boosts BB gauge considerably

dictionary.lore: Elphelt's signature shotgun cleans up any room, guaranteed. It's the perfect twelve-gauge solution for a fighting, yet classy lady.

819095.name: Miss Travailler

819096.desc: 30% boost to Atk, max HP, 50% boost to Atk when BB gauge is over 50%, raises normal hit amount & normal attack boosts BB gauge enormously

dictionary.lore: Elphelt's signature pistol is proof that good things come in small sizes. One shot is all it takes to marry its lead to the groom--or bride--of your choice. Permanently.

819096.name: Nougat P08

819097.desc: 30% boost to all parameters, raises normal hit amount, 30% boost to critical hit rate, 100% boost to critical damage, probable normal attack on all foes & raises Atk parameter limits to 150000

dictionary.lore: Elphelt's signature rocket launcher is the stylish way to blow up your enemies. Alternatively, you can use it to perform impromptu firework shows for monstrous villains...before you blow them up.

819097.name: Explosive Genoverse

819101.desc: 50% boost to Atk, 75% boost to Spark damage, critical damage boosts BB gauge & hugely boosts critical damage for 2 turns when damage dealt exceeds certain amount

dictionary.lore: An ornate greatsword that is rumored to be the harbinger of massive destruction. It is covered in jewels and ancient runes of power.

819101.name: Platinum Sword

819102.desc: 15% boost to all parameters, boosts OD gauge fill rate, reduces BB gauge required for BB & considerably boosts drop rate of BC, HC when attacking

dictionary.lore: A metal bangle from another world covered in runes of mystic power. It is said to bring bravery, luck, and skill to its bearer.

819102.name: Platinum Bangle

819120.desc: Restores HP each turn, considerably boosts BB gauge each turn & activates at turn's end effects during turn's start instead

dictionary.lore: An embellished looking silver key imbued with a mysterious power.

819120.name: Silver Key

819121.desc: Greatly boosts elemental damage, considerably restores HP each turn, greatly boosts BB gauge each turn & activates at turn's end effects during turn's start instead

dictionary.lore: A gold key suffused with an inexplicable power.

819121.name: Gold Key

819122.desc: Adds all elements to attack, hugely boosts elemental damage, greatly restores HP each turn, enormously boosts BB gauge each turn & activates at turn's end effects during turn's start instead

dictionary.lore: A solemn looking key decorated with diamond, it seems suffused with an incomprehensible power.

819122.name: Diamond Key

819123.desc: 45% boost to all parameters, negates critical and elemental damage, low probability of enormous damage reduction, reduces damage taken from Light, Dark types & activates Dark barrier after activating OD

dictionary.lore: A magical tome closely guarded by Mard Geer.

819123.name: Book of E.N.D

819127.desc: 70% boost to Atk and max HP of Female types, boosts/lowers Atk relative to how high remaining HP is, boosts elemental damage, 100% boost to Atk, Def for first 4 turns & raises Atk parameter limits to 150000

dictionary.lore: Baiken's iconic glass mono-goggle. Worn over her missing eye, it adds more flare to her unique image. It does not boast the same offensive powers as her arsenal of "Demon Tools," but it has been with her through thick and thin since the aftermath of the Crusades.

819127.name: Baikenâ€™s Mono-goggle

819128.desc: 15% boost to all parameters, 50% Atk boost when BB gauge is full, greatly boosts BB gauge each turn & boosts BC drop rate

dictionary.lore: May's orange pirate tricorn hat. The cute skull ornament on it has seen May's growth from a 'young' orphan to the leader of the Jellyfish Pirates. The hat holds much of her cherished memories from adventuring with Johnny onboard the Mayship.

819128.name: May's Pirate Tricorn

819129.desc: 100% boost to Spark damage, 50% boost to Atk and 50% boost to Spark damage when Sparks exceed certain amount, Spark damage boosts BB gauge & reduces BB gauge required for BB
819129.name: Johnny's Coin

819130.desc: 100% boost to Atk, 50% boost to Atk when BB gauge is over 50%, boosts Atk when HP is over 50%, boosts critical damage & hugely boosts OD gauge fill rate

dictionary.lore: This is Leo Whitefang's personal dictionary, where he privately enjoys adding people and incidents to its pages to expand the definitions of existing words. For example, his older sister is recorded under "Devil," reflecting his fear of her.

819130.name: Leo's Dictionary

819138.desc: 30% boost to Def, Rec and max HP, highly probable damage reduction, raises normal hit amount & 5% damage reduction from Light types

dictionary.lore: A holy shield, adorned with radiant pure-white wings. Such shields are onlyÂ bestowed upon Holy Knights of renowned skill and valor.Â It protects theÂ wielderÂ against both physical and magical attacks, and also endows him or her withÂ righteous fury, granting the strength to endure any battle.

819138.name: Sacred Shield

819139.desc: 25% boost to all parameters, greatly boosts critical hit rate, reduces BB gauge required for BB, spark damage boosts BB gauge, boosts Atk and Rec when BB gauge is over 50% & adds great OD gauge fill rate boost for 3 turns effect to BB/SBB

dictionary.lore: This apple looks fascinating, alien, and too weird to eat. The bearer of the artifact feels the presence of countless other memories, imparting wisdom and knowledge. It would seem that the memories are held within the apple, drawn from millennia of previous owners from another world.

819139.name: Forbidden Apple

819153.desc: 30% boost Atk, Rec, HP (Female only), negates Atk, Def, Rec reduc. effects, dmg taken may heal, boost BB gauge, reduces BB gauge req. for BB & resist. 1 KO after OD

dictionary.lore: This strange bell-embellished artifact is used by shrine maidens from a faraway land. Its true potential, however, can only be drawn out by those gifted with heavenly voices and ethereal melodies.

819153.name: Kagura Suzu

819163.desc: 30% boost to Atk, Def and Rec, negates status ailments, negates Def ignoring effect, negates critical and elemental damage & 50% Spark damage reduction

dictionary.lore: This strange petal-embellished artifact is used by shrine maidens from a faraway land. While it can drive away evil spirits with a simple swish, its true potential can only be brought to life by those gifted with heavenly voices and ethereal melodies.

819163.name: Sakura Onusa

819990.desc: Boosts Atk, Def, Rec, and max HP by 10%

dictionary.lore: A glowing red crystal stone that contains the essence of Burny's fiery core. It feels hot and glows exceptionally bright where it is touched. Whoever holds it can still hear Burny's raging gnarls echoing in the distance â€œS..Stop blaming me for down time..!!â€. The anger-filled stone strengthens its bearer with a bit of a temper.

819990.name: Burny's Soul Stone

819991.desc: Immensely strengthens the bearer, granting god-like abilities.

dictionary.lore: In the distant past, lost in the history of Grand Gaia.. The creator's of space and time forged a sword out of nothingness. A sword that is nothing, but powerful as a something. Its blades cut through space, slashes through time, a tool for exterminating their own faulty creations.

819991.name: Creator's Blade

849990.desc: Boosts Rec by 10%, and Increased Critical Chance

dictionary.lore: A glowing yellow crystal stone charged with electrical energy that gently jolts the bearer, accelerating recovery rate of the body. It's electrical energy is rumored to stimulate the bearer to be more alert in battle.

849990.name: Charge Stone

880001.desc: A mysterious relic used to evolve the Unit Grandt
880001.name: Ruby Relic

880003.desc: A mysterious relic used to evolve the Unit Elaina
880003.name: Emerald Relic

880011.desc: A mysterious relic used to transcend the Unit Mercenary Grandt
880011.name: Sanguine Relic

880013.desc: A mysterious relic used to transcend the Unit Mercenary Mage Elaina
880013.name: Verdant Relic

880020.desc: A shiny medal for those who have stood the test of time.

dictionary.lore: A shiny medal made to adorn the chest of those who have stood the test of time. Many claim it holds precious memories.

880020.name: Toy Medal

880201.desc: A precious metal used to craft the Devaâ€™s weapons and armor, as well as their grandest buildings.

dictionary.lore: When refined the right way, the metal weighs incredibly light and is impenetrable to most materials except itself and the Morokaiâ€™s infamous Orihalcum

880201.name: Mithril

880202.desc: Found in the deepest underground caverns, Morokai harvest this special ore for their best equipment.

dictionary.lore: Extremely dense and almost impossible to break, weaponry and armor made from Orihalcum are incredibly heavy but are nigh impervious to all manner of attacks

880202.name: Orihalcum

880211.desc: A unique ore used to improve Korzanâ€™s axe.

dictionary.lore: The aspect of the Destroyerâ€™s rage made manifest. One can feel the unrestraint anger gushing out from it. The peace one seeks is found within

880211.name: Fury of the Destroyer

880212.desc: A unique ore used to improve Haileâ€™s battlestaff.

dictionary.lore: The aspect of the Ice Queenâ€™s pride made manifest. One can feel the utter disdain seeping into the surroundings. Pride goes before destruction, a haughty Deva before a fall

880212.name: Scorn of the Ice Queen

880213.desc: A unique ore used to improve Avani's chain blades.
880213.name: Bond of the Monster Hunter

880214.desc: A unique ore used to improve Mikael's shield.
880214.name: Grief of the Storm Champion

880215.desc: A unique ore used to improve Allanonâ€™s staff.
880215.name: Love of the Loremaster

880216.desc: A unique ore used to improve Nyamiâ€™s bells.
880216.name: Desire of the Shadow Cat

dictionary.lore: A pungent chocolate said to be only given to the pure-hearted young of Randall by the guardians in the skies. It is a rare and precious Item that should be cherished.

880218.desc: A beautiful flower that shines in seven different colors

dictionary.lore: A mysterious rainbow colored flower found deep in the forest where Bonnie headed. Rumors say the essence of this flower supplies the luminous energy for Bonnie's cannon.

880218.name: Chromatic Blossom
